Behind the Design of the TRON Videogame (1982)

stories.text: I'm curious to learn how people set up daily things such as shared calendar, to-do's, knowledge base, etc. with their partner. Especially when one part of the couple is less technical. I have the feeling a lot of thought process and software products go into team management in a work context. Not sure this assumption is true but only few couples seem to have designed an explicit system to manage their personal life. I'd like to learn from the ones who think they implemented such a system successfully - what worked, etc. (under the caveat that every couple is different of course!)
stories.title: Ask HN: How do you organize life with your partner?
